# DNS records for feedsubscription.com
# Managed via DigitalOcean. Apply changes with:
#   doctl compute domain records create feedsubscription.com --record-type TXT --record-name foo --record-data "bar" --record-ttl 3600
#   doctl compute domain records delete feedsubscription.com <ID>
# List current records (with IDs):
#   doctl compute domain records list feedsubscription.com

# --- Hosting ---
A       @               207.154.253.211         TTL=3600
A       localhost       207.154.253.211         TTL=3600
CNAME   www             @                       TTL=43200

# --- Mail ---
MX      @               @                       priority=10  TTL=3600

# --- Email authentication ---
TXT     @               v=spf1 mx include:spf.protection.outlook.com include:ppe-hosted.com -all   TTL=3600
TXT     mail._domainkey v=DKIM1; h=sha256; k=rsa; s=email;    TTL=3600
TXT     _dmarc          v=DMARC1; p=reject; adkim=s; aspf=s; rua=mailto:dmarc-reports@feedsubscription.com; ri=604800   TTL=3600

# --- Google Search Console verification ---
TXT     @               google-site-verification=cSSQYxQXkz37jcRrQtn044JPmFUsxC9D8oXyhyuVCuY   TTL=3600
